 Staff, Faculty & Postdocs 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 You may now request your employee R'Card online. 
 To Qualify: 
 You must be an active employee and your profile must be in our ID system. It takes two business days after your official Start Date for our system to update with your record. 
 4 Steps To Apply: 
 Step 1 - ID Photo:   Log in to  myphoto.ucr.edu  with your NetID and password. Carefully follow the instructions on that page to submit both an approved photo and proof of identity (a government-issued ID). One photo submission per person.  Card Services reserves the right to refuse any photos that do not meet our requirements . You will be notified by email that your materials have been received, and again when your photo and ID have either been approved or rejected. 
 Step 2 - Request Form:  Click the button below to fill out the "Staff/Faculty/Postdoc R'Card Request Form". The information helps us to learn your correct employee status and other key details including your eight-digit Employee ID #, which can be found on your  UCPath dashboard . 
 Step 3 - Request Review:  Card staff will review your request and provide the go-ahead to move to Step 4. This is necessary to ensure our ability to provide you with an employee R’Card as we do not issue refunds. 
 Step 4 - Payment:  The $30 R'Card fee can be paid by departmental FAU or with a credit card. We accept Visa, MasterCard, or Discover card. To pay by credit card, your options include: 
 Calling our secure phone line (951) 827-2211 
 Paying in person at the Highlander Service Station 
 Clicking the Cashnet link:  https://commerce.cashnet.com/UCR_CARDSERVICES
